data.title: NetSuite ERP Implementations
data.meta_description: Get NetSuite Implementation pricing fast and start your ERP project with North America’s largest, award-winning NetSuite Implementation Partner.
data.text:
ERP Implementations

NetSuite Software and Cloud Solutions

NetSuite’s solutions allow you to run your entire business in the cloud with one unified software system. With access to ERP, SuiteSuccess, and CRM+, you’ll have all the tools you’ll need to scale up your business. Speak with a representative to get your implementation project started today.

What Is NetSuite?

NetSuite ERP is one of the world’s leading enterprise resource planning systems, with a completely cloud-based platform and a large ecosystem of add-ons, third-party applications, and industry-specific features.

GURUS has been implementing NetSuite Cloud ERP across all industries for nearly two decades now with more than 2500 successful go-lives and a long-running award-winning status as a top-tiered NetSuite Alliance Partner.

NetSuite Pricing: ERP Implementation Cost

NetSuite Implementation Pricing Guide

Accelerate the order-to-cash process by 50%+.

Slash financial close by over 50%

Improve workforce productivity with any time, anywhere access.

Lower cost of ownership by eliminating upfront and ongoing IT expenditures, and delivering automatic product upgrades.

Whether you need to connect your back-office to your existing systems, access real-time data from anywhere, scale your business globally, or customize your software to fit your needs, NetSuite’s ERP can help you achieve your goals.

With NetSuite ERP, you can get ahead of costly and time-consuming manual processes and focus on growing your business. Plus, you can always enjoy the benefits of having the latest version of the software with regular updates. NetSuite’s ERP is designed to integrate, adapt, and scale with your business.

Use our NetSuite Price Calculator to get a fast estimate from our team, check out our NetSuite Pricing Guide to learn more about how to structure your implementation project, or click “Get Pricing” on the form to the left.

NetSuite Implementations by Industry

GURUS Solutions understands the unique processes and needs of your industry. From our experience working with hundreds of companies, paired with NetSuite’s cutting-edge features, GURUS Solutions provides complete packages and separate modules that can be smoothly integrated with your platform, and specifically customized to meet your company needs.

Healthcare

Enhance the healthcare experience for your patients, providers, and payers by streamlining processes, reducing complexity, and lowering costs. Implement a patient-centered healthcare approach with the help of NetSuite for a more targeted and personalized experience.

Manufacturing

Elevate your business by centralizing the management of finances, supply chain, product control, orders, and more. With NetSuite, you gain a comprehensive manufacturing solution to scale your business and enhance inventory management.

Non-Profits

Simplify your operations, focus on your mission, and strengthen donor connections with NetSuite. Utilize its innovative products to fuel and advance your nonprofit's mission.

Professional Services

Embrace change, achieve complete visibility into client experiences, and enhance customer satisfaction through NetSuite's tailored solutions for Professional Services.

Retail

Expand your retail operations by leveraging a cloud-based solution specifically crafted to cater to the needs of your omnichannel shoppers, provided by NetSuite for Retail.

Wholesale Distribution

Revitalize and modernize your wholesale distribution business with a tailored cloud ERP solution. Manage sales, marketing, finances, orders, sourcing, warehousing, and more, all in one centralized platform.

Didn’t see what you’re looking for?

Couldn’t find your industry? Don’t worry! With over 15 years of experience and over 2500 successful projects, GURUS can help you with your implementation project regardless of industry.

Want to get started? Speak to an implementation specialist today for a FREE 30-minute consultation.

What Does NetSuite Do?

Top NetSuite Features

Financial Management

Used by thousands of organizations to manage their accounting needs. This software accelerates your financial close, provides strong expense management, offers streamlined and auditable revenue management, and ensures complete real-time visibility into the financial performance of the business.

Accounting | Fixed Asset Management | Payment Management

Supply Chain and Inventory Management

Offers a complete set of inventory management, manufacturing, and purchasing capabilities that helps move inventory to the right place, at the right time, at the right cost. Gain an in-depth, real-time view into key supplier, inventory, and shop floor performance indicators.

Demand Planning | Inventory Control and Warehouse Management | Purchasing and Vendor Management | Manufacturing

Procurement

Helps companies buy goods and services promptly at the best cost, saving valuable time with easy-to-use capabilities, reducing costs by channeling purchases to approved suppliers and pre-negotiated contracts, and improving visibility by rendering real-time information into company spend and vendor performance.

Purchase Requisition | Purchase Contract & Blanket PO | Approval Workflow

Order and Billing Management

Fast-track your order-to-cash process by eliminating manual bottlenecks and errors and establishing a smooth flow from sales quote to approved order, successful order to fulfillment, and timely invoicing to payment.

Billing Management and Invoicing

Warehouse and Fulfillment

Optimally manage distribution operations with RF device-directed putaway and picking tasks driven by customized user-defined strategies and advanced capabilities like wave management, cartonization, cycle count planning, real-time inventory updates, and integration with shipping systems.

Receiving and Putaway | Order Fulfillment | Inventory Management | Real-time Visibility and Control

Revenue Recognition Management

Help schedule, calculate, and present revenue on your financial statements accurately. Automate revenue recognition with financially intelligent capabilities to report results per accounting standards.

Flexible Revenue Recognition Scheduling | Percentage of Completion Accounting | Revenue Arrangements with Multiple Deliverables | Software and Service Contracts

Financial Planning

Model and evaluate different financial scenarios to set targets for your annual operating plan, in a bottoms-up or top-down manner, and then analyze the variance between actual and projected results to manage business performance.

Flexible Modeling | “What-If” Analysis | Comprehensive Reporting and Analysis

Human Capital Management

While maximizing the value of your company's most important resource, its workforce, you also need to minimize what you spend on managing it. Additionally, as your organization grows, finding more cost-effective, flexible solutions to administer your growing, diverse and dispersed workforce becomes a necessity.

Core HRIS | Payroll Services | Incentive Compensation Management | NetSuite TribeHR

Recurring Revenue Management

Integrate all of your front- and back-office processes for your subscription-based business. Improve customer retention and watch your business grow as existing customers renew and new customers get acquired.

Flexible Pricing Management | Powerful Billing Logic | Subscription Renewal Intelligence

NetSuite Products

As a top NetSuite Alliance Partner, GURUS is ready to help you with your NetSuite implementation project, whether it’s for NetSuite ERP, NetSuite CRM+, or SuiteSuccess.

NetSuite SuiteSuccess

What is NetSuite SuiteSuccess

In order for their customers to succeed, NetSuite SuiteSuccess combines communication and engagement with a meticulously engineered pathway through the following tactics.

Benefits of SuiteSuccess

Go from 0 to cloud in 100 days with NetSuite’s specialized rapid implementation methodology.

Out-of-the-box set of dashboards, custom fields, roles and functionalities.

Targeted towards your industry practices and built to help manage rapid growth.

Get live data at your fingertips from anywhere in the world.

What NetSuite SuiteSuccess Can Bring to Your Business

Optimizing

NetSuite is always adding new value and never ceases to be on the latest release. They push forward:

continuous engagement

continuous updates and implementations of new leading practices

continuous release of new features

continuous evaluation of partnerships

continuous movement up the stairway

Empowering Entrepreneurs To Build Legendary Businesses

NetSuite’s activities and systems are uniquely designed to generate rapid value. Their pre-configured solutions include:

Industry expertise: more than 3,000 hours’ worth of industry-leading practices already built into the system

Pre-defined roles: business activation

Built-in KPIs tailored to your business and dedicated process flows

Turnkey: setup and training

Over 250 reports, dashboards, and business intelligence immediately adapted and built on leading practices for your industry

Building

NetSuite has built a complete suite to support the ever-growing modern business, including:

ERP, CRM, PSA, Omnichannel commerce, HR, and Business Intelligence built on the #1 Global Cloud Platform

Cutting-edge capabilities continually updated with technologies to help manage every industry

Engaging

From the very first sales contact to services and support, NetSuite delivers essential practices for each industry, as well as roles including:

Workflows, KPIs, reports, dashboards and metrics

Option to personalize SuiteCloud platform (with additional value at each stage of the engagement)

Consuming

With the help of their industry stairway, they deliver an intelligently staged approach that allows their customers to consume capabilities based on their business requirements. They achieve zero to cloud in 100 days by a re-imagined consumption model that drives:

Faster time to value

Has better ROI and greater user adoption

NetSuite CRM+

NetSuite CRM+ software delivers powerful customer relationship management (CRM) capabilities, including sales force automation (SFA), marketing automation, customer support and service, and flexible customization, all in a web-based CRM solution.

Benefits of NetSuite CRM+

Drive sales, service, and marketing performance with real-time, role-based dashboards.

Gain a true 360-degree view of all customer data and customer interactions.

Improve sales performance with accurate sales forecasts, automated commission, and upsell management.

Improve collaboration with your partners using joint lead and campaign management.

Streamline order management processes with complete integration across sales and finance.

Features of NetSuite CRM+

Lead Management

Track partner leads and referrals within a single application, enabling you to win-and retain-more customers

Enable your partners to register and track their leads via one, easy-to-use partner management tool application

Analyze conversion rates and ROI by lead source, and view how many leads were generated by each lead source.

Forecasting

Provide accurate, up-to-the-minute partner sales forecasts that include projected amount of sale, probability of close, and weighted amount of each transaction

Assess how each team across your diverse reseller channel is performing through aggregated reports across territories and teams

Provide deep visibility into the channel pipeline to let managers assess the amount of potential revenue that exists at each phase of the sales cycle.

Case Management

Cut costs and improve workflow by automating the business processes associated with customer support case assignment, management, and escalation

Route cases intelligently, enabling fast, efficient prioritization

Respond to customer cases across a variety of mediums, including e-mail, phone, and fax

Log and analyze e-mail communications in order to better serve current and future customers

Route and track support cases according to product, issue, case type, partner or customer, giving customers a specialist in each area to address their concerns

Enable online case creation and self-service case updates.

Sales Tracking and Order Management

Give partners the ability to place and track orders themselves, diminishing the need for your own sales and support teams to monitor the process

Gain full visibility into all of your partners' leads, orders and sales activities; use that data to create customized reports according to the criteria you set

Provide resellers access to up-to-the-minute volume and negotiated pricing, eliminating the concern that your resellers are promising prices or promotions that are outdated.

Real-time CRM Dashboards

NetSuite's dashboards communicate information quickly, effectively and in real time. Whether a sales person, sales or marketing VP, or customer service manager, NetSuite equips them with the right information at the right time:

For sales: The sales team get instant access to key measures such as achieved vs. quota, actual versus sales forecast, commissions, sales pipeline by stage, % net new customers versus those up-sold

For customer service: The service team can quickly identify % calls resolved, monitor First-Call Resolution (FCR) metrics, analyze customers renewing maintenance, see call volume and trends as well as monitor customer satisfaction

For marketing: The marketing team gets instant lead to close metrics, number of website unique visitors, lead-generation form completion, customer acquisition costs, and much more

For executives: Get cross company visibility into financial and CRM measures-financial measures such as bookings and billing, sales pipeline measures and customer service performance.
